Get degree status of students by ID

Source: R/get_status_degrees.R
get_status_degrees.Rd

Subset the rows of a data frame by student ID. The data are student degree attributes keyed by student ID (midfielddegrees or equivalent). Results are student ID, institution, and degree.

get_status_degrees(data = NULL, keep_id = NULL)

Arguments

data

data frame of degree attributes
keep_id

character vector of student IDs

Value

data.frame with the following properties:

  • Rows for which student ID is in keep_id

  • Columns id, institution, and degree

  • Grouping structures, if any, are not preserved

  • Data frame extensions tbl or data.table are preserved

Details

The default data argument is midfielddegrees, accessed by name or by leaving the data argument vacant. Any other data argument should be a subset of midfielddegrees or equivalent. Character columns id, institution, and degree are required by name.

If the keep_id argument is NULL, all IDs in data are used by default.

See also

Other data_query: get_cip(), get_enrollees(), get_graduates(), get_institution_hours_term(), get_institution_limits(), get_race_sex(), get_status_transfers()

Examples

music_codes <- c("500901", "500903", "500913")
students <- get_enrollees(codes = music_codes)
students <- get_status_degrees(keep_id = students$id)
str(students)
#> Classes 'data.table' and 'data.frame':	745 obs. of  3 variables:
#>  $ id         : chr  "MID25853762" "MID25854314" "MID25855043" "MID25857363" ...
#>  $ institution: chr  "Institution B" "Institution B" "Institution B" "Institution B" ...
#>  $ degree     : chr  NA "Bachelor's Degree" "Bachelor's Degree" "Bachelor's Degree" ...
#>  - attr(*, ".internal.selfref")=<externalptr>
